item.title: Hegseth says soldiers from Wounded Knee will keep Medals of Honor
item.description: The previous defense secretary, Lloyd Austin, had asked the Pentagon to review 20 medals that were given to soldiers from the massacre.

item.title: National Weather Service at ‘breaking point’ as storm approaches
item.description: The National Weather Service is struggling to maintain its forecasting operations due to significant staffing cuts under the Trump administration.
